trans-unit.source: Defines a point, associated with a user event, to be tracked in the potential execution path of a root workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: Define um ponto, associado um evento de utilizador, para ser controlado no potencial caminho de execução de uma instância de fluxo de trabalho raiz.

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: Esta classe não pode ser herdada.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] An activity designer or a workflow designer may use the overloaded <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity.TrackData%2A?displayProperty=fullName> and <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext.TrackData%2A?displayProperty=fullName> methods to instrument the workflow to emit data to the runtime tracking infrastructure as a user event.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]Um designer de atividade ou um estruturador de fluxo de trabalho pode utilizar o sobrecarregado <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity.TrackData%2A?displayProperty=fullName>e <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext.TrackData%2A?displayProperty=fullName>métodos para instrumentar o emitir dados para o tempo de execução de infraestrutura como um evento de utilizador de controlo do fluxo de trabalho.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext.TrackData%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity.TrackData%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The data emitted is referred to as user data.
trans-unit.target: Os dados emitidos são referidos como dados de utilizador.

trans-unit.source: Unlike activity status events, and workflow status events, which occur only on status changes, user events can occur at any location that is instrumented in a workflow.
trans-unit.target: Ao contrário dos eventos de estado de atividade e eventos de estado do fluxo de trabalho, que ocorrem apenas no alterações de estado, podem ocorrer eventos de utilizador em qualquer local que está instrumentada num fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: There are many reasons to instrument a workflow to emit user events.
trans-unit.target: Existem muitos motivos para instrumentar um fluxo de trabalho para emitir os eventos de utilizador.

trans-unit.source: For example, a workflow designer may want to communicate logical state information about the progress of a workflow, or an activity designer might want to provide an opportunity to activity members at times other than an activity status change.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, poderá pretender um estruturador de fluxo de trabalho comunicar Estado lógico informações sobre o progresso de um fluxo de trabalho ou um designer da actividade poderá pretender fornecer uma oportunidade de atividade membros por vezes que não seja um Estado de atividade alterar.

trans-unit.source: A UserTrackPoint defines a point of interest in the potential execution path of a root workflow instance associated with a user event.
trans-unit.target: Um UserTrackPoint define um ponto de interesse no caminho potenciais execução de uma instância de fluxo de trabalho de raiz associada um evento de utilizador.

trans-unit.source: A UserTrackPoint contains locations that are included in matching, locations that are excluded from matching, and any additional data that should be extracted from the workflow instance when the track point is matched.
trans-unit.target: Um UserTrackPoint contenha localizações que estão incluídas na correspondência, as localizações que são excluídas da correspondência e quaisquer dados adicionais que devem ser extraídos da instância de fluxo de trabalho quando o ponto de registo é correspondido.

trans-unit.source: You can add a UserTrackPoint to <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile.UserTrackPoints%2A?displayProperty=fullName> to instruct the runtime tracking infrastructure to send a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingRecord> to the tracking service when the track point is matched.
trans-unit.target: Pode adicionar um UserTrackPoint para <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile.UserTrackPoints%2A?displayProperty=fullName>ao instruir o tempo de execução do controlo de infraestrutura para enviar um <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingRecord>para o serviço de controlo quando o ponto de registo é correspondido.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingRecord> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile.UserTrackPoints%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The user data is returned in <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingRecord.UserData%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Os dados de utilizador são devolvidos em <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingRecord.UserData%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingRecord.UserData%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A single UserTrackPoint may be matched at multiple points in the workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: Um único UserTrackPoint pode corresponder a vários pontos de uma instância de fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation> contains match conditions for a location associated with a user event in the potential execution path of a workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation>contém as condições de correspondência para uma localização associado um evento de utilizador no caminho potenciais execução de uma instância de fluxo de trabalho.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation>

trans-unit.source: You can add <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation> objects to <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackPoint.MatchingLocations%2A> to define locations that should be included in matching for the track point.
trans-unit.target: Pode adicionar <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation>objetos a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackPoint.MatchingLocations%2A>Definir localizações que devem ser incluídas na correspondência para o ponto de registo.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackPoint.MatchingLocations%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation>

trans-unit.source: Similarly, you can add <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation> objects to <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackPoint.ExcludedLocations%2A> to define locations that should be excluded from matching for the track point.
trans-unit.target: Da mesma forma, pode adicionar <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation>objetos a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackPoint.ExcludedLocations%2A>Definir localizações que devem ser excluídas da correspondência para o ponto de registo.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackPoint.ExcludedLocations%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation>

trans-unit.source: You can add <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityDataTrackingExtract> objects and <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowDataTrackingExtract> objects to <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackPoint.Extracts%2A> to specify data that should be extracted from the workflow instance when the track point is matched.
trans-unit.target: Pode adicionar <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityDataTrackingExtract>objetos e <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowDataTrackingExtract>objetos a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackPoint.Extracts%2A>para especificar dados que devem ser extraídos da instância de fluxo de trabalho quando o ponto de registo é correspondido.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackPoint.Extracts%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowDataTrackingExtract> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityDataTrackingExtract>

trans-unit.source: The extracted data will be returned in <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingRecord.Body%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Os dados extraídos serão devolvidos na <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingRecord.Body%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingRecord.Body%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: You can add to <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackPoint.Annotations%2A> to specify additional information associated with the track point.
trans-unit.target: Pode adicionar a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackPoint.Annotations%2A>para especificar informações adicionais associadas com o ponto de registo.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackPoint.Annotations%2A>

trans-unit.source: These annotations will be returned in <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackPoint.Annotations%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Estes anotações serão devolvidas na <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackPoint.Annotations%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackPoint.Annotations%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: For an example of how to use this class, see the [Tracking Using User Track Points Sample](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/d894a18a-a4c6-467e-9a42-8be025ecd4d5).
trans-unit.target: Para obter um exemplo de como utilizar esta classe, consulte o [controlo utilizando o utilizador controle pontos exemplo](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/d894a18a-a4c6-467e-9a42-8be025ecd4d5).

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackPoint"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackPoint"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: The default constructor initializes an empty track point.
trans-unit.target: O construtor predefinido inicializa um ponto de registo vazio.

trans-unit.source: No matching locations, excluded locations, data extracts or annotations are specified.
trans-unit.target: Não existem localizações correspondentes, localizações excluídas, extrai dados ou anotações estão especificadas.

trans-unit.source: You must configure the track point by adding at least one <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation> to <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackPoint.MatchingLocations%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Tem de configurar o ponto de registo adicionando-a, pelo menos, um <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation>para <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackPoint.MatchingLocations%2A>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackPoint.MatchingLocations%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation>

trans-unit.source: You may optionally add the appropriate objects to <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackPoint.ExcludedLocations%2A>, <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackPoint.Extracts%2A>, and <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackPoint.Annotations%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Opcionalmente, pode adicionar os objetos apropriados para <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackPoint.ExcludedLocations%2A>, <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackPoint.Extracts%2A>e <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackPoint.Annotations%2A>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackPoint.Annotations%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackPoint.Extracts%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackPoint.ExcludedLocations%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of annotations associated with the track point.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a coleção de anotações associados com o ponto de registo.

trans-unit.source: You can add to Annotations to specify annotations to be returned in Annotations when the track point is matched.
trans-unit.target: Pode adicionar anotações para especificar as anotações devem ser devolvidos em anotações quando o ponto de registo é correspondido.

trans-unit.source: If Annotations is empty, no annotations are associated with the track point.
trans-unit.target: Se estiver vazia anotações, não anotações associadas com o ponto de registo.

trans-unit.source: Annotations are `strings` that you define that contain information associated with the track point.
trans-unit.target: As anotações são `strings` definir que contêm informações associadas com o ponto de registo.

trans-unit.source: For example, an annotation could contain information about the possible execution path the workflow can take from this track point, or it could contain information to be displayed in a user interface.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, uma anotação pode conter informações sobre o caminho de execução possíveis o fluxo de trabalho pode demorar a partir deste ponto de registo ou pode conter informações a apresentar numa interface de utilizador.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingAnnotationCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingAnnotationCollection"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty collection.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é uma coleção vazia.

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of locations that should be excluded from the track point by the runtime tracking infrastructure.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a coleção de localizações que deve ser excluído do ponto de controlar a infraestrutura de controlo do tempo de execução.

trans-unit.source: If any of the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation> objects in ExcludedLocations is matched for a particular user event, the track point will not be matched and no <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingRecord> will be sent to the tracking service.
trans-unit.target: Se qualquer uma do <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation>objetos ExcludedLocations é correspondido um evento de utilizador em particular, não será possível corresponder o ponto de controlar e nenhum <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingRecord>serão enviados para o serviço de controlo.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingRecord> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation>

trans-unit.source: If ExcludedLocations is empty, there are no excluded locations.
trans-unit.target: Se ExcludedLocations está vazio, não existem nenhum localizações excluídas.

trans-unit.source: You can use ExcludedLocations to exclude specific locations from being tracked by the runtime tracking infrastructure.
trans-unit.target: Pode utilizar ExcludedLocations para excluir localizações específicas a ser controlada pelo tempo de execução a infraestrutura de controlo.

trans-unit.source: For example, you can exclude a subset of locations that are specified in <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackPoint.MatchingLocations%2A> in order to more precisely refine the locations that should be tracked by the track point.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, pode excluir um subconjunto das localizações especificadas na <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackPoint.MatchingLocations%2A>para poder mais precisamente refinar as localizações que devem ser controladas pelo ponto de registo.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackPoint.MatchingLocations%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocationCollection"></xref> that specifies locations to be excluded from the track point.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocationCollection"> </xref> que especifica as localizações a serem excluídos o ponto de registo.

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty collection.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é uma coleção vazia.

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection that specifies data to be extracted from the workflow instance and sent to the tracking service.
trans-unit.target: Obtém uma coleção que especifica os dados a ser extraído da instância de fluxo de trabalho e enviados para o serviço de controlo.

trans-unit.source: When the track point is matched, the runtime tracking infrastructure sends a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingRecord> to the tracking service.
trans-unit.target: Quando o ponto de registo é correspondido, o tempo de execução controlo infraestrutura envia um <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingRecord>para o serviço de controlo.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingRecord>

trans-unit.source: The user data is returned in <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingRecord.UserData%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Os dados de utilizador são devolvidos em <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingRecord.UserData%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingRecord.UserData%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The runtime tracking infrastructure can also extract data specified in Extracts from the workflow instance and send this in the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingRecord>.
trans-unit.target: A infraestrutura de controlo do tempo de execução também pode extrair dados especificados na extrai da instância de fluxo de trabalho e enviar isto <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingRecord>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingRecord>

trans-unit.source: The extracted data is encapsulated in <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingDataItem> records and returned in <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingRecord.Body%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Os dados extraídos são encapsulados no <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingDataItem>regista e devolvida <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingRecord.Body%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingRecord.Body%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingDataItem>

trans-unit.source: You can add <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityDataTrackingExtract> objects to Extracts to specify member data that should be extracted from the activity associated with the user event and you can add <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowDataTrackingExtract> objects to Extracts to specify member data that should be extracted from the root activity of the workflow.
trans-unit.target: Pode adicionar <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityDataTrackingExtract>objetos extrai para especificar os dados de membro que devem ser extraídos da atividade associada o eventos de utilizador e podem adicionar <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowDataTrackingExtract>objetos extrai para especificar os dados de membro que devem ser extraídos da atividade raiz do fluxo de trabalho.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowDataTrackingExtract> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityDataTrackingExtract>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ExtractCollection"></xref> that specifies data to be extracted and sent to the tracking service.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ExtractCollection"> </xref> que especifica os dados a ser extraído e enviados para o serviço de controlo.

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty collection.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é uma coleção vazia.

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of locations that should be included in matching for the track point by the runtime tracking infrastructure.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a coleção de localizações que devem ser incluídas correspondente para o ponto de controlar a infraestrutura de controlo do tempo de execução.

trans-unit.source: If MatchingLocations is empty, the track point cannot be matched by the runtime tracking infrastructure.
trans-unit.target: Se MatchingLocations tem um valor está vazio, o ponto de registo não pode ser correspondido pelo runtime infraestrutura de controlo.

trans-unit.source: You must add at least one <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation> to MatchingLocations for the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackPoint> to participate in matching.
trans-unit.target: Tem de adicionar pelo menos um <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation>para MatchingLocations tem um valor para o <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackPoint>participar no correspondente.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackPoint> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation>

trans-unit.source: The track point will be matched if any of the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation> objects in MatchingLocations is matched and none of the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation> objects in <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackPoint.ExcludedLocations%2A> is matched.
trans-unit.target: O ponto de registo será correspondido se qualquer uma do <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation>objetos MatchingLocations tem um valor é correspondido e nenhuma do <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation>objetos no <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackPoint.ExcludedLocations%2A>é correspondido.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackPoint.ExcludedLocations%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocationCollection"></xref> that specifies the locations to be matched for the track point.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocationCollection"> </xref> que especifica as localizações de correspondência para o ponto de registo.

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty collection.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é uma coleção vazia.
